ch.nolix.interfaces.util

Interface Signable


  • public interface Signable
    A signable object is an object that can have an info string.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and SIMPLE_CLASS_NAME Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_INFO_STRING

        java.lang.String getInfoString()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns:
        the info string of this signable object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if this signable object has no info string
